title: Funerary inscription for Jason the Elder
support: Small irregular square plaque of white marble; previously set in plaster, removed and cleaned in 2016/2017. The rear is finished smooth, the edges cut back roughly on the rear face (for mounting).

layout.p: Eight lines of Greek filling the face, with the final line only made up of the last two letters. Double guidelines between lines 2-3 and 4-5, single guidelines above line 1 and line 7.

handNote.lettering: Some terminations to strokes/heavy serifs, but mostly serif free. Lunate epsilon and sigma, cursive omega. Letters somewhat irregular in size and placement.

provenanceFound._:
Probably from Catania: the text is similar to another inscription found
                                on via Antonino di Sangiuliano, and now in the Museo di Archeologia of Università di
                                Catania (inv. 05/136 = ).
